function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate and inaccurate information disclosure from the government to the public","Impact":"Increased public misunderstanding of risks and unrealistic demands for risk reduction","Mitigation":"Implement transparent and comprehensive information disclosure strategies, and educate the public on accurate risk perception","Technologies":"Public information portals, social media platforms for official announcements","People":"Public, government officials","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Limited effectiveness of government decision-making on risk governance","Impact":"Inefficient risk management and control of public health emergencies","Mitigation":"Utilize expert advice and data-driven decision-making processes, and promote collaboration between government and experts","Technologies":"Data analytics and modeling tools, expert consultation platforms","People":"Government, experts, public","Owner":"Government and expert organizations"}]}
